2072.subject: LL
2072.descrlong: Traces the emergence of the scientific method and scientific modes of thought out of the ancient philosophical and religious traditions of the west from the pre-Socratic philosophers of ancient Greece to the Medieval and Renaissance ¿awakenings¿ of the seeds of modern science. Highlights the impact of ancient science on Medieval Christianity and the development of the Copernican-Newtonian worldview. (LL Core class)
